title: New: Their Wedding â€“ Hiding
content: Impressing with their debut single, Want, LA duo Their Wedding are back, with a new electro-pop gem, Hiding. Mixing the autotuned vocals with slightly cheesy, albeit brilliant songwriting, Michael and Alvaro, formerly of California indie-pop outfit The Motel Life, have hit upon the winning formula. Check out Hiding below, and keep up with Their Wedding on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
